title: Magic molecule
creator_credit: Christopher Chapman, Hugh O'Connor, Nicholas Balla and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A film showing the new world created by the techniques and processes of the plastics industry. Transmuted from coal, oil or wood, synthetic substances can make thousands of new products, from silk threads to furniture. With a light and lively treatment, this film explores the colorful, versatile world of these synthetic materials.
